long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# YouTube Video Counter

Track your YouTube viewing habits effortlessly!

## What does it do?
YouTube Video Counter keeps a tally of how many YouTube videos you've watched since installing the extension. It's a simple, unobtrusive way to monitor your YouTube consumption.

## Key Features:
• Automatic counting: No need to manually log your videos - we do it for you!
• Clean, minimalist design: A sleek popup that doesn't clutter your browser.
• Start time tracking: See when you began your YouTube journey with this counter.
• Privacy-focused: All data is stored locally on your device.

## Perfect for:
• Content creators tracking their research
• Students monitoring study video consumption
• Anyone curious about their YouTube habits

## How it works:
1. Install the extension
2. Watch YouTube videos as usual
3. Click the extension icon to see your count and start date

Gain insights into your viewing patterns without any extra effort. Whether you're trying to increase your educational video intake or just curious about your YouTube usage, YouTube Video Counter provides a quick, at-a-glance summary of your viewing history.

Stay aware, stay informed about your online video consumption with YouTube Video Counter!

Note: This extension only counts the number of videos watched and the start date. It does not track video titles, channels, or any personal data.
